definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: What king would ever become " lowly , and riding upon an ass"?
sentences.chinese: 有哪一位国王会“谦谦和和地骑著驴”？

sentences.english: While personally a modest man, Dr LEE was a bold leader.
sentences.chinese: 李博士为人谦和，同时也是一位大无畏的领导。

sentences.english: The cloud stood humbly in full ofive pgood of the sky.
sentences.chinese: 白云谦和地站在天之一隅。

sentences.english: Maintaining in a modest and peaceful mental state pushes us further up to a higher level.
sentences.chinese: 保持谦和的心理状态有助于我们达到更高的高度。

sentences.english: China since ancient times, etiquette, speech which mostly reflect the modesty and respect people.
sentences.chinese: 中国自古讲究礼仪，言语当中多是体现自谦和敬人。

sentences.english: These humble shepherds were the first to hear and ponder the wondrous news of the birth of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 谦和的牧民们第一次听到并思索着基督诞世之奇闻。

sentences.english: He is modest affability with high responsibility and nobility medical ethics.
sentences.chinese: 为人谦和，有高度的责任心和高尚医德。

sentences.english: The wise man opens his front door with humility and a spirit of acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 聪明的人总是带着恭谦和接受的态度打开前门。

sentences.english: On Wednesday we went to William and Wendy's wedding in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 星期三我们去了华盛顿参加了威谦和温迪的婚礼。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
neither servile nor overbearing (idiom)/neither obsequious nor supercilious
amiable and approachable (idiom); easy-going/modest and unassuming/(of writing) plain and simple/easy to understand
